meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed busulfans to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients often receive busulfans as part of their cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The busulfans decided to have a dance-off with the cancer cells.
meanings.sent4: The busulfans acted like brave warriors battling the cancer invaders.
meanings.sent5: The busulfans worked tirelessly to defeat the cancer, like tiny heroes in the body.
